review: Extremely disappointed in this item. I actually returned it. It didn't include HBO and other networks that I wanted so there was no need to keep it.
author: Diane Natuzzi

review: This was a gift and it works great, figuring out how to use the remote effectively was tricky but within a couple of uses I have it down, It came with a free 30 day trial of Amazon Prime which didn't work out so well but with a few emails Amazon fixed the problem, I just wish Prime had a bigger selection of movies
author: Jamie Conklin

review: Great buy and we use it daily.
author: Esteban Marquez

review: Love it! Way better than Apple TV!
author: Veronica

review: I returned it because there was no way for me to access movies from my computer
author: Debra J Istwan

review: Simple to connect, receives signal perfectly. I may be saying bye-bye to overpriced cable.
author: LAWRENCE J. DAMIAN

review: Great product, though I wish it had Wi-Fi ac as that had been on the market for more than two years now or even a gigabit port.
author: i.cs
